cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A serene escape awaits in Lolly, our refurbished caravan tucked away amidst the lush gardens. Blending comfort and tranquility with a double bed, basic cooking facilities, tea & coffee, plus heater for cooler nights. Shared facilities just 30m away.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
